item.title: [j22] Drudge Beetle
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Drowsing Tyrannodon
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

As long as you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Drowsing Tyrannodon can attack as though it didn't have defender.

item.title: [j22] Drownyard Explorers
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [j22] Dread Slaver
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Dread Slaver this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

item.title: [j22] Dread Rider
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Knight

{1}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses 3 life.

item.title: [j22] Dreadhound
item.description:
Creature — Demon Dog

When Dreadhound enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

Whenever a creature dies or a creature card is put into a graveyard from a library, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [j22] Dreadful Apathy
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

{2}{W}: Exile enchanted creature.

item.title: [j22] Drannith Stinger
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Whenever you cycle another card, Drannith Stinger deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [j22] Drag Under
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Human Barbarian Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [j22] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Mage
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Wizard

Flying

Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

item.title: [j22] Dragonlord's Servant
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Fodder
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Fodder
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

item.title: [j22] Dragon Egg
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Egg

Defender

When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

item.title: [j22] Dragon Blood
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.title: [j22] Doomed Traveler
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [j22] Doomed Dissenter
item.description:
Creature — Human

When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [j22] Domesticated Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

{X}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

As long as Domesticated Hydra is monstrous, it has trample.

item.title: [j22] Djinn of Wishes
item.description:
Creature — Djinn

Flying

Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.

{2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

item.title: [j22] Divine Verdict
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [j22] Divine Arrow
item.description:
Instant

Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [j22] Dismiss
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

Draw a card.

item.title: [j22] Devouring Swarm
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Flying

Sacrifice a creature: Devouring Swarm gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Devouring Light
item.description:
Instant

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [j22] Destructive Tampering
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

item.title: [j22] Desert of the Mindful
item.description:
Land — Desert

Desert of the Mindful enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U}.

Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [j22] Demon's Grasp
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Demon's Disciple
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Demon's Disciple enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [j22] Demonic Gifts
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

item.title: [j22] Defy Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [j22] Deem Worthy
item.description:
Instant

Deem Worthy deals 7 damage to target creature.

Cycling {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Deem Worthy, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature.

item.title: [j22] Decree of Justice
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

item.title: [j22] Declare Dominance
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.

item.title: [j22] Death Wind
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Deathbringer Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [j22] Deathbloom Thallid
item.description:
Creature — Fungus

When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

item.title: [j22] Dead Weight
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

item.title: [j22] Deadbridge Goliath
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [j22] Daybreak Charger
item.description:
Creature — Unicorn

When Daybreak Charger enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j22] Daybreak Chaplain
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [j22] Dawn of Hope
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

item.title: [j22] Dawning Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Dawning Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

item.title: [j22] Danitha Capashen, Paragon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

First strike, vigilance, lifelink

Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [j22] Dance with Devils
item.description:
Instant

Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

item.title: [j22] Cyclops Electromancer
item.description:
Creature — Cyclops Wizard

When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [j22] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [j22] Cryptic Serpent
item.description:
Creature — Serpent

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

item.title: [j22] Cruel Sadist
item.description:
Creature — Human Assassin

{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Cruel Sadist.

{2}{B}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Cruel Sadist: It deals X damage to target creature.
